title: Add meditation course and update course descriptions with duration details

requirements.text: Add a new meditation course with age group 18+ to the course catalog

quotes: Isme 1 course or add kar do mediation course jo age group 18 + k liye ho

acceptanceCriteria: New meditation course is available in the course list
Course has age requirement of 18+ displayed
Course can be enrolled in by eligible students

requirements.text: Update Basic Midbrain Activation course description to include duration: 3 days, 1 hour online classes daily

quotes: Basic Midbrain activation course duration 3 day - 1 hourse online classes daily

acceptanceCriteria: Course description indicates 1 hour daily online classes

requirements.text: Update Advance Midbrain Activation course description to include duration: 15 days, 1+ hours online classes daily

quotes: 2nd course advance Midbrain activation course Duration 15 day 1 hours + online classes daily

acceptanceCriteria: Course description indicates 1+ hours daily online classes

requirements.text: Update Institution course description to include duration: 1 month, 1+ hours online classes daily

quotes: 3rd intitution course Duration 1 month + 1 Hours+ online classes daily

acceptanceCriteria: Course description indicates 1+ hours daily online classes

requirements.text: Display updated course descriptions with duration details on all frontend course views including public homepage, course list, and student dashboard

quotes: Sath mein sabhi course k discription mein details dalna hai

acceptanceCriteria: Course duration and daily class hours are visible in course cards
Updated descriptions appear on public homepage course highlights
Course details are shown in student dashboard available courses tab

requirements.text: Assign a unique image for the new meditation course and display it consistently across all course views
acceptanceCriteria: Meditation course displays with its own distinctive image
Image appears in course list, student dashboard, and public homepage

constraints: Maintain existing course structure and enrollment system
Preserve existing student application form functionality
Keep all existing courses (Basic, Advance, Super/Institution) intact
nonGoals: Student fee tracking and due payment functionality

required: Serene meditation scene with person in lotus position, warm lighting and peaceful atmosphere for meditation course (meditation-course.dim_800x600.png)
